findings.liver: normal in size, no focal mass or diffuse abnormality, no bile duct dilatation, gallbladder normal
findings.pancreas: normal in size, no focal mass or diffuse abnormality, no peripancreatic stranding
findings.kidneys: normal in size, no focal cortical mass, solid or cystic, equal and prompt nephrograms bilaterally, pelvicalyceal systems and ureters normal
findings.lymph nodes: no retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymph node enlargement or other mass

digestive tract.jejunum and ileum: normal mucosal pattern, no signs of small bowel dilatation
digestive tract.colon: no obstructing lesion, appendix normal caliber, no signs of appendicitis, no periappendiceal stranding
digestive tract.left lower quadrant: area of stranding with focal encapsulated fat, classic appearance of epiploic appendagitis
digestive tract.pelvis: no abnormal lymph node enlargement or other mass, prostate normal in size, urinary bladder unremarkable, small amount of free fluid in rectovescical pouch
